JUDGES: Anatoly Kovler;Christos Rozakis;Dean Spielmann;Elisabeth Steiner;Khanlar Hajiyev;Sverre Erik Jebens
TEXT: The applicant , Mr PERSON Kolesnikov , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in GPE , GPE . ORG ( “ the Government ” ) were represented by Mr PERSON PERSON , ORG before ORG .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .
The applicant sued local welfare authorities for an increase of the disability benefits due to him .

By judgment of DATE , as upheld on appeal on DATE , ORG of GPE ( ORG ) ordered the authorities to pay the applicant a lump sum of MONEY ( RUB ) and to increase the DATE and DATE disability payments in line with the relevant domestic legislation .
On DATE the lump sum was paid to the applicant in full but he continued to receive DATE payments in the amount lower than awarded .
On DATE the Presidium of ORG ( the ORG ) quashed the judgment of DATE on supervisory review and remitted the case for a new examination at the first instance court .
On DATE ORG re - examined the case and granted the applicant ’s claims . On DATE ORG upheld these findings on appeal .
On DATE the ORG again quashed the judicial decisions of DATE and DATE by way of the supervisory review proceedings and ordered a fresh examination of the case .
By judgment of DATE , as upheld by the appeal decision of CARDINAL DATE , ORG allowed the applicant ’s action in part .
The applicant applied for the supervisory review of the CARDINAL latest judicial decisions .
On DATE the ORG granted his application , quashed the judgments of DATE and DATE in supervisory review proceedings and ordered that the case be examined afresh by the court of the first instance .

On DATE ORG in the new round of court proceedings examined and granted the applicant ’s claim . It ordered the local welfare authority to pay the applicant a lump sum of RUB CARDINAL in arrears in respect of various disability benefits and recalculated and further increased the DATE and DATE payments due to him .
On DATE the judgment entered into force . According to the Government , it was fully executed on DATE .
